title: Stop send heartbeat to broker when ProducerGroup is offline in proxy
description:
BUG REPORT

The steps to reproduce

  1. Start a remoting producer
  2. Send a transaction message to proxy
  3. Stop producer quickly before send heart beat
  4. Will find proxy sill send heart beat to broker for this producer group
